name: 安德里亚·巴斯曼
awards: 2018年 第71届洛迦诺国际电影节 当代电影人单元金豹奖 (提名) 浮士德
2018年 第18届温哥华影评人协会奖 加拿大电影最佳导演 (提名) 浮士德
2018年 第40届南特三大洲电影节 南特三大洲电影节 金热气球奖  (提名) 浮士德
name_full: 安德里亚·巴斯曼 Andrea Bussmann
introduction: Born in 1980 in Toronto, Andrea Bussmann studied Social Anthropology at the York University in Canada, where she also earned a Master of Fine Arts in Film Production in 2009. Her first feature film was HE WHOSE FACE GIVES NO LIGHT (2014), followed by TALES OF TWO WHO DREAMT (2016), which premiered at Berlinale Forum and presented at FICUNAM. Her latest film, FAUST, will be premiering at the Locarno Festival.
